segments.text: This is just so frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely ignoring the water pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being reckless, climbing on that stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just standing there, waiting for trouble to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware the mom is of everything going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just polishing that plate like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step in and fix everything before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
